description.full: Klass.
description.summary: Klass.

description.full:
Library version.

Returns a string in the form of `n.n.n`.
description.summary:
Library version.

Returns a string in the form of `n.n.n`.

comments.code: Klass.version = '0.4.5';

description.full:
Delimiter used among namespaces.

Default `.`.
description.summary:
Delimiter used among namespaces.

Default `.`.

comments.code: Klass.delimiter = '.';

description.full: Namespace manager reference.
description.summary: Namespace manager reference.

comments.code: Klass.namespace = require('./klass/namespace');

description.full: Cache manager reference.
description.summary: Cache manager reference.

comments.code: Klass.cache = require('./klass/cache');

description.full: Base object interpolation.
description.summary: Base object interpolation.

comments.code: Klass.base = require('./klass/base');;

description.full:
Attaches methods `define` and `create` on a given object.

Returns the given object.
description.summary:
Attaches methods `define` and `create` on a given object.

Returns the given object.

description.full:
Defines in the `Klass.cache` a new object.

Returns the cached object.
description.summary:
Defines in the `Klass.cache` a new object.

Returns the cached object.

description.full:
Creates a new object giving a namespace and options

Returns the object just created.
description.summary:
Creates a new object giving a namespace and options

Returns the object just created.

description.full:
Create a new object using Object.create. The arguments will be
passed to the new instances init method or to a method name set in
__init.
description.summary:
Create a new object using Object.create. The arguments will be
passed to the new instances init method or to a method name set in
__init.
